hints.content: Every time we move right on the number line, we add the distance we move.

$480\redE{+20}=500$

[[☃ image 1]]

Let's keep adding to label the other points on the number line.

options.alt: A number line with 3 unequally spaced tick marks. From left to right, the tick marks are labeled 480, 500, and question mark. An arrow labeled plus 20 is above the number line beginning at 480 and ending at 500. !

A number line with 3 unequally spaced tick marks. From left to right, the tick marks are labeled 480, 500, and 639. An arrow labeled plus 20 is above the number line beginning at 480 and ending at 500. An arrow labeled plus 139 is above the number line beginning at 500 and ending at 639. !

hints.content:
This leads to the same sum because, altogether, that is a distance of:

$\redE{20}+\purpleE{139}= \blueE{159}$

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line with 3 unequally spaced tick marks. From left to right, the tick marks are labeled 480, 500, and 639. An arrow labeled plus 20 is above the number line beginning at 480 and ending at 500. An arrow labeled plus 139 is above the number line beginning at 500 and ending at 639. An arrow labeled plus 159 is above the number line beginning at 480 and ending at 639. !

hints.content:
This is Miriam's completed number line:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line with 3 unequally spaced tick marks. From left to right, the tick marks are labeled 480, 500, and 639. An arrow labeled plus 20 is above the number line beginning at 480 and ending at 500. An arrow labeled plus 139 is above the number line beginning at 500 and ending at 639. An arrow labeled plus 159 is above the number line beginning at 480 and ending at 639. !

question.content:
Miriam thinks about $480+\blueE{159}$ as $480+\redE{20}+\purpleE{139}$ to solve in her head. Here is part of a number line to represent her thinking.

[[☃ image 1]]

**Which number line correctly labels the other tick marks?** 

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A number line with 3 unequally spaced tick marks. From left to right, the tick marks are labeled 480, an unlabeled tick mark, and an unlabeled tick mark. An arrow labeled plus 20 is above the number line beginning at 480 and ending at the first unlabeled point. An arrow labeled plus 139 is above the number line beginning at the first unlabeled point and ending at the second unlabeled point. An arrow labeled plus 159 is above the number line beginning at 480 and ending at the second unlabeled point. !
